_header: Luke in his gospel / Sweetly he will us tell
_description: Gospel, ‘In vigilia sancte trinitatis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines: Luyk in his gospelleSwetliche he wol vs telle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And brouht hem to þat hiȝe blisseHe lete vs neuere
                    þer of misse. amen.
